English.Text: Your band of fools mock the old sailor. "Old wives tales!" they guffaw, savaging the feast like locusts, stuffing their mouths with a fervour that would be unthinkable back home. But when one of them suddenly turns pale, realisation dawns on the othersâ€” the food is poisoned! Who did this? Why? All your crew survive, but the poisoning is very serious, and requires weeks of recuperation before your crew is ready to depart this cursed place.
